channel.title: New And improved Item Recoloring Program
channel.description:
This is my New (and Improved) Item Recolor Maker. it supports all of the following Items (So far 27): [code] Dragon Scimitars Long Swords Short Swords Abyssal Whip Normal Scimitars Dragon Daggers Mace Battle Axe 2 Handed Swords Halberds War Hammers Plate Body's Plate Legs Plate Skirts Chain Body's Full Helms Med Helms Sq Shields Kite Shield Pickaxe's Ore (Like tin copper and so on) clay (hey why not) Bars (Smithed bars like gold bars) Throwing Knifes Darts Nails (Like whats used in Construction) Claws [/code]
Mining and Smithing Items will now be under one button not 2 Fletching will now say Wood Crafting (Due to it will have Wood cutting and Fletching in it) Runecrafting and magic will be merged (making Rune-Magic)
[size=12pt][b]Please Post if you Use it, or every if you thing it looks good![/b][/size]
Newest Zip File Virus Scan http://virusscan.jotti.org/en/scanresult/9245f51eb1b9d7876bf14773a58ee0de8a866197
[size=14pt][b]Newest Download[/b][/size] Zip File http://www.mediafire.com/?nm21tmhyyb2 Note: If you want a RaR file, PM me for it It take longer to upload and VS both, and they are the exact same.
[URL=http://s794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/?action=view&current=img1.png][IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/th_img1.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/?action=view&current=img2.png][IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/th_img2.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/?action=view&current=img3.png][IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/th_img3.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://s794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/?action=view&current=img4.png][IMG]http://i794.photobucket.com/albums/yy222/Hackerzinc/th_img4.png[/img][/URL]
V1.1 info: Made Weapons Only Long Scripts Slowed It down Very Bad Item Adding Supprt
V1.2 info: Makes Weapons and Armor Smaller size due to scripts being re-written and running of just one Color template (Last one had the colors added to each room, now they are added to just one, and then that room is called) Higher Item Adding Supprt
V1.3 info: Coming Soon
I am Now taking a few requests for custom Items, If you want a certain Item added, PM me, or post it here!
[size=14pt][b]THIS PROGRAM WAS MADE IN Game Maker 7 Pro, NOT VB 2008 (I don't like using any type of VB)[/b][/size]

item.title: New And improved Item Recoloring Program
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

I Put this here for 3 reasons:

  1. More people look in this section, so I will get more downloads.
  2. I have it in the Client Hacks Section as well.
  3. I will be working on a code that is added to this to generate the codes to go into the server as well (Makes it a bit easier for the users)!

Read full topic

item.title: New And improved Item Recoloring Program
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

Ya go ahead and open it with reghacker and see what happens dumb ass, It will show almost nothing!

and I’m not following with the Question, are you talking about adding custom items or custom colors?

Oh and BTW RegHacker Is for editing a Registry not a program dumb ass, to edit a program (Basic information) you would use ResHacker. but ResHacker only allows you to change things like, icons, small images, and the information when you view the properties of a file!

Read full topic

item.title: New And improved Item Recoloring Program
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

This is my New (and Improved) Item Recolor Maker. it supports all of the following Items (So far 27):

Dragon Scimitars
Long Swords
Short Swords
Abyssal Whip
Normal Scimitars
Dragon Daggers
Mace
Battle Axe
2 Handed Swords
Halberds
War Hammers
Plate Body's
Plate Legs
Plate Skirts
Chain Body's
Full Helms
Med Helms
Sq Shields
Kite Shield
Pickaxe's
Ore (Like tin copper and so on)
clay (hey why not)
Bars (Smithed bars like gold bars)
Throwing Knifes
Darts
Nails (Like whats used in Construction)
Claws

Mining and Smithing Items will now be under one button not 2
Fletching will now say Wood Crafting (Due to it will have Wood cutting and Fletching in it)
Runecrafting and magic will be merged (making Rune-Magic)

[size=12pt]Please Post if you Use it, or every if you thing it looks good![/size]

V1.1 info:
Made Weapons Only
Long Scripts Slowed It down
Very Bad Item Adding Supprt

V1.2 info:
Makes Weapons and Armor
Smaller size due to scripts being re-written and running of just one Color template (Last one had the colors added to each
room, now they are added to just one, and then that room is called)
Higher Item Adding Supprt

V1.3 info:
Coming Soon

I am Now taking a few requests for custom Items, If you want a certain Item added, PM me, or post it here!
